title-group.article-title: NUMBER FIELDS WITH SOLVABLE GALOIS GROUPS AND SMALL GALOIS ROOT DISCRIMINANTS

abstract.p: We apply class field theory to compute complete tables of number fields with Galois root discriminant less than 8πe γ . This includes all solvable Galois groups which appear in degree less than 10, groups of order less than 24, and all dihedral groups D p where p is prime.
